ad_text: Airport Freight X-Change Sponsored Experienced OTR drivers wanted Minimum 1 year experience required $1400-$2400/Week with bonuses. Airport Freight X-Change has OTR driving positions available. All loads originate from our terminal in Byron Center, MI We have runs to all 48 states -Run your preferred lanes. -Reload directly back to Michigan. -Flexible home time. -Preloaded trailers. Pay -Pay is based on actual miles on ELD not computer miles. -Monthly Safety Bonus -Monthly Mileage Bonus -Stop pay for every pickup & delivery. -Detention/Layover/Breakdown pay Benefits -Medical/Dental/Vision Insurance -401(k) + company match -Company paid Life Insurance -Vacation Pay/PTO -Holiday Pay -Referral Bonus Send us a message today if you are interested and you would like us to contact you. 2 YEARS EXPERIENCE PREFFERED, 1 YEAR REQUIRED OTR DRIVERS WANTED Business, Transport Service, Storage Send message
